lead_paragraph: Andy Murray punctured Novak Djokovic's air of dominance by beating the out-of-sorts Serb in straight sets in the final of the Italian Open in Rome on Sunday.
snippet: Andy Murray punctured Novak Djokovic's air of dominance by beating the out-of-sorts Serb in straight sets in the final of the Italian Open in Rome on Sunday....

headline.main: Djokovic Suffers Rare Loss as Murray Takes Rome Title
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Suffers Rare Loss as Murray Takes Rome Title
